name: Agent Lovesdick
description:
After rumors about members of Rebel Nymes Guild having sex among them, Mr. Trupson, the biggest businessman of Plymouth Town realizes that this is an opportunity to take over the most respectful position in the city.

To prove theses acts which are unacceptable by local elders, Lovesdick is hired by the businessman and his duty is to collect pieces of evidence capable of closing the Guild. Although his work seemed easy, what he didn't expect was that watching people having sex would turn him on.

Find out in this gay adventure!Features
  • Play with a naked boy (optional);
  • Classic RPG Gameplay mixed with:
  • A Stealth System;
  • Immersive Story and Characters;
  • Side Quests;
  • Day and Night System;
